title: 23. A recent reorganization in your company has seen the creation of a new data custodian team – responsible for managing data in all storage locations. Your production GCP project uses buckets in Cloud Storage, and you need to delegate control to the new team to manage objects and buckets in your GCP project. What role should you grant them?
alternatives: A. Grant the data custodian team Project Editor IAM role.
B. Grant the data custodian team Storage Object Creator IAM role.
C. Grant the data custodian team Storage Admin IAM role.
D. Grant the data custodian team Storage Object Admin IAM role.
